name: NEST4
description: NEST4 is a long-term digital investment ecosystem built on transparency, structure, and sustainability. NOR4 is the official token representing participation within the NEST4 framework, aligning holders with a disciplined and future-oriented digital investment vision.
notes: NOR4 is actively tradable on the market. The NEST4 digital investment fund will be launched in a later phase according to the official roadmap.
